p: The Prophet Muhammad (SAW) also used to take Senna leaves and it is a part to treat diseases. Ibraheem ibn e abi laila narrates that Prophet Muhammad (SAW) says “necessarily use Sena and sanoot; because there is a cure in both of them from every disease except the “saam” someone asked ya Rasulalah what is saam? Replied that death!” (Ibn e Majah 3457).
